recommended_degree: Teknik Elektro, Teknik Fisika, Teknik Instrumentasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as an Electrical Control & Instrumentation Intern to support the team in documentation and basic control system development. Your tasks will include:

1. Sorting and organizing engineering documents such as Standards, SOPs, and Work Instructions.
2. Assisting in developing a PID calculator.
3. Supporting the development of a control system project.

This position is ideal for graduates who want hands-on experience in electrical control, instrumentation, and automation projects.
